alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 1:11PM MST until December 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Yuma County. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to dangerous. Widespread blowing snow will lead to blizzard like conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. High winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
